SEARCH
Package my.uum.entity

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
my.uum.entity.Comment
@Entity public class Comment extends Object
Entity class representing a comment in the system. Each instance of this class corresponds to a comment made by a user.
Since:
2024-01-21
